alert.note: Alert for Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 2:53PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Marion County through 330 PM EDT... At 253 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Rainbow Lakes Estates, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Dunnellon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
